about_the_game:
Sentenced to death in The Labyrinth for crimes you were not guilty of. The Minotaur's constructed The Labyrinth during the Primordial Age. Once seen as Eres's ultimate prison, something has gone terribly wrong with the structure. As a survivor, find terrifying monsters, and harsh experiments – or hidden oases and forgotten cities. Discover allies or foes who have shared the same fate. Be careful, not everyone will have your best interest at heart.


Turn-Based Combat:
Tactically decide how to deploy party members. Remember, once deployed that unit is placed for the battle-sequence. How units are deployed will greatly impact the conflict ahead. Pick and choose what to cast, attack, and defend with.


Choose Your Path:
Codex can stabilize The Labyrinth in sections but cannot keep each catacomb consistent. Decide which path to go. More monsters, loot, mystery, or ruins? Find the heinous monsters of The Labyrinth. Plunder for more gear and discover what was left behind from eons ago. Discover failed experiments or settlements. Uncover lost secrets, or parts of ancient cities.


Discover Different Biomes:
The Labyrinth is full of different twists and turns. Prepare for battle across different landscapes! Fight in a primordial jungle, teeming with life and flora. Wander the dark damp caves, where minerals, plants, and hidden tunnels where creatures may lurk. Discover the architecture of old Eres, where the wonders of the old world still stand. More biomes will be announced as development continues.

Build Your Own Dungeons:
Synchronize with Codex and learn to stabilize rooms. Create unique dungeon layouts, mix and match enemies, biomes, lighting – anything that can be imagined! The Labyrinth has been used for ages to experiment, now it’s your turn.


Story Ahead:
Discover lost notes, landmarks, echoes, and experiments. Every dungeon has new quests that have the possibility of unlocking new storylines in the town of Serena. Ada’s Grove will be a resourceful location to finish notes and access more stories for the truly lore hungry. Make sure to speak with your companions after each mission – they may have news quests, rewards, or intel for you.


Advance Your Relationships:
It’s impossible to survive in The Labyrinth alone. Each companion found in the town of Serena will have new questlines to discover. Everyone has a purpose down in these hellish halls, and everyone had a life before coming here.



Gameplay Features:
• Discover unique storylines with party members.
• Choose which dungeon objective, based off your playstyle or play all the ones available!
• Once you collect enough dungeon chunks, you will be able to start editing existing dungeons – or not. The choice is yours.
• Build your character. Choose from three diverse classes: The Warrior, The Mage, and The Rogue.
• Tactically deploy your units in a turn-based style grid.
• Collect materials and craft: armor, weapons, potions, and elixirs.


Survive in The Labyrinth long enough to uncover the primordial magics of these forsaken halls and discover what horrors the ancient races intended to be buried – forever.

short_description: Silentium is an RPG dungeon crawler, with dungeon building aspects. Discover lost ruins, tactically deploy your party members, build new dungeons, upgrade your character, and get sweet loot.
